There‚Äôs video editing, and then there‚Äôs Beatleap. We‚Äôre here to make the impossibly time consuming task of editing a video accessible in a few taps, and always at the tips of your fingers. Through vivid interactions and a playful editing experience, the game begins - and only you will determine your end destination.

Whether you‚Äôre mixing your next workout instruction video, boomeranging your last trip, enjoying the scenery, or just dancing it out with friends - we‚Äôre setting the rhythm of your life to video, and for the first time ever, it‚Äôs also intuitive.

With video editing driven by the music, the audio you choose determines the right moments for effects, styles, slowing down your video, or speeding it up. Beatleap delivers a new, powerful video editing experience, raising the bar of what anyone can create.

Make engaging, memorable videos in seconds and preserve your favorite moments in ways that fuel your creativity.

No more struggles to sort and find the best clips - you choose what you want to show, throw it in with the music you choose, and we‚Äôll mix it up. Out comes a video a step above what you imagined, that tells your story - the funny ones, the adventurous ones, and all the bloopers in between. So what are you waiting for? Your next clip awaits!

apps.name: CPU Max Public
apps.subtitle: Subscription "Pro" activated
apps.localizedDescription:
Sometimes we don't know the hardware information of our cell phone.
Sometimes we don't know how much traffic we have used.
Sometimes we don't know the performance of our phone's camera or how long it's been on.
CPU Max can help you to solve this problem easily. With it, a small and light app, you can check the detailed parameters of your phone, and there are convenient widgets and widgets that you will love to use.

Main functions:
- Basic information: phone name, heat generation, sensors, interface, size, etc.
- Processor: name, model, number of crystals, cpu cores, architecture, real-time main frequency, downscaling ratio, etc.
- Memory: total memory, memory details usage, etc.
- Network: connection type, traffic, external IP, internal IP, upload and download speed, etc.
- Battery: capacity, estimated available time, power, low battery mode, etc.
- Storage: total capacity, used capacity, remaining capacity
- Screen: material, size, brightness, refresh rate, etc.
- Camera: aperture, HDR, anti-shake, exposure time, resolution, frame rate, etc.
- System: type, version, kernel, boot time, active time, supported versions, etc.

Tools:
- widget: negative screen notification bar widget, real-time refresh, graphic overview
- Traffic statistics: statistics of cell phone traffic, can set package traffic (Note: and operator data may have errors)
- Network speed test: test the latency, jitter, upload speed, download speed, etc. of your network
- Spin the wheel: Choose for yourself through the turntable, you can freely set the theme and style, fun and easy to use
- Flip clock: display the page flip clock in full screen, the phone becomes a beautiful flip clock, the effect can be customized
- Straight ruler: Turn your phone into a ruler with a millimeter scale, measure at any time, easy to use
- Password generator: support 8 to 64-bit complex passwords, support the function of saving passwords, only saved locally (Tip: different platforms using a unified account password is most likely to generate information leakage)
- Screen test: full-screen display of different types of Screen test pictures, so that problematic screens are visible at a glance
- Conversion: binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal free conversion, you may use

There will be more in the future, we want to be the best mobile tool, if you have a gadget you want, feel free to tell us in the App feedback.

Note: If you select the Health widget, the app will need to read the step, distance and calorie data from your Health app to display the data on the widget.

Member subscription:
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features of Find Device
- Subscriptions are charged on a weekly basis, depending on the subscription plan chosen

By using CPU Max, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://kuangbaoat.github.io/cpumax/privacy.html
https://kuangbaoat.github.io/cpumax/terms.html

Rooted in the well-established Pomodoro Technique, this app provides a streamlined and engaging interface that segments work into focused intervals separated by brief pauses. In this overview, we will explore the app‚Äôs key functionalities and advantages, illustrating how it can elevate your productivity and help you meet your objectives with greater clarity and intention.

apps.name: Battery Webhook
apps.subtitle: Send your battery info to popular services using webhooks!
apps.localizedDescription:
Webhooks allow an application to send real-time data to another application whenever a specific event occurs. What if you could send battery information whenever you connected your device to power? Even better, what if you could easily send it to a messaging app like Discord, in an easy-to-read format?

Battery Webhook achieves this and also has:
- A fully modern design, built in Swift and SwiftUI
- Manual sending of battery info in the app
- Automations support with Shortcuts Automations
- Siri Shortcuts support
- A highly power efficient design, with minimal power usage

It is simple to use the app, just fill out a few basic details and you can send your device's battery info. If you ever run into any roadblocks, there's step-by-step documentation available.

Documentation: https://docs.thatstel.la/battery-webhook
Source code and bug reports: https://github.com/ThatStella7922/battery-webhook

Note: Battery Webhook is not affiliated with or endorsed by Discord Inc in any way. All trademarks are property of their respective owners.
Note 2: Battery Webhook installed from AltStore/SideStore does not include the Apple Watch app.

versions.localizedDescription:
- Added support for iOS and iPadOS 14
- Added support for Shortcuts on iOS and iPadOS 15 or older, enabling the use of automations on older devices
- Added an option to override the webhook's preset avatar & name with your own avatar and display name (for Discord webhooks)
- Added an option to show author details in automated battery info, not just manually sent battery info (for Discord webhooks)
- Added support for sending to multiple webhooks of the same type by listing them comma separated
- Fixed an issue where Battery Webhook would rarely be unable to accurately determine the OS version
- Author details will now be shown in automated battery info, not just manually sent battery info
- Lots of code improvements
- Other minor bug fixes

Thanks for using Battery Webhook!
- Stella

Y√™u c·∫ßu: IOS 17.0 tr·ªü l√™n 
Effortless editing. Total control. Meet the fast, free, and focused mobile video editing app that's powerful enough for any idea, yet simple enough for anyone to use. Edit videos from wherever you are, with no ads or watermarks. Premiere offers unmatched speed on a precise multi-track timeline and studio-quality audio featuring crystal clear voice recordings and perfectly timed AI sound effects -- plus Firefly-powered visuals to create stand out videos.

Tell your story with unique, scroll-stopping videos. Level up your content with AI editing tools and create stand out edits to share on TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, and more. Record voiceovers and achieve studio-quality audio with crystal clear voice recordings and perfectly timed AI sound effects. Get inspired and kickstart your project with Adobe‚Äôs massive library of free creative assets. Speed up your editing with Adobe Firefly AI-generated sound effects, images, videos, and stickers.

Capture the moment and create trends with Adobe Premiere.

FEATURES:

LIGHTNING-FAST TIMELINE
‚Ä¢ Frame-Accurate Edits: Trim, split, or merge video clips with the industry‚Äôs most accurate video editor.
‚Ä¢ AI Auto Captions: generate captions and add attention grabbing animations in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Smooth Speed Effects: speed up, slow down, reverse or freeze key moments.
‚Ä¢ Unique Colour Presets: Apply Adobe Lightroom presets and fine tune to fit your aesthetic.
‚Ä¢ Instant Background Removal: Cut out subjects with one tap. Create overlays, title effects, and more.

PRECISION CONTROL
‚Ä¢ Unlimited Tracks: Overlay clips and organize your timeline with no limits to your creativity.
‚Ä¢ Resize and Post to Any Platform: Adjust videos to fit any aspect ratio and share anywhere easily.
‚Ä¢ Advanced Clip Controls: Flip, fit, fill, or extract audio to customise every cut.

STUDIO QUALITY SOUND
‚Ä¢ AI Enhance Speech: Create studio quality voiceovers with the help of AI.
‚Ä¢ DIY Sound Effects: Use your voice to generate your own sounds.

GENERATIVE AI ASSETS
‚Ä¢ AI Text to Image Generation: create unique, commercially safe images from a simple text prompt with Adobe Firefly.
‚Ä¢ Stickers That Pop: Generate your own AI stickers or select from the free in-app library.
‚Ä¢ AI Background Expansion: Extend, enhance, or replace backgrounds with a prompt.

FREE LIBRARY OF CREATIVE ASSETS
‚Ä¢ Get going with quality images, sounds, music, and video from the Adobe library.
‚Ä¢ Add Music to Your Videos: Select from a library of free and royalty free tracks.
‚Ä¢ Respects Creator Content Ownership: Adobe never trains on user content.

SPEED AND PERFORMANCE
‚Ä¢ Built natively on iOS for a fast, smooth, editing experience.
‚Ä¢ Import your assets directly from your device or favourite cloud storage provider.
‚Ä¢ Edit without distracting pop-up ads, clutter, or watermarks.

FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND USE
‚Ä¢ Everything you need to create great videos is available for free. Only pay when you need Firefly generative AI credits.

Photoshop on mobile includes a wide selection of free features to accomplish all the core photo editing capabilities. Whether you're new, curious, or already familiar with Photoshop, we‚Äôve made it easier than ever to learn and expand your creative skills.

Photoshop on mobile simplifies your creative & design needs:
- Add new objects
- Blur or remove backgrounds
- Replace backgrounds and remove unwanted objects
- Retouch, refine and perfect your images with targeted adjustments
- Combine multiple images to create high-quality compositions and explore intuitive AI tools
- Create unique collages, album cover art, perfect your passion projects, and develop unique digital art‚Äîall in one place

There is no limit to what you can create.

KEY FEATURES

REMOVE OR REPLACE BACKGROUNDS
- Effortlessly select the background with the Tap Select tool.
- Easily replace backgrounds with an image directly from your phone, create AI-generated backgrounds with Generative Fill, or select from a large library of Adobe Stock images, including textures, filters and patterns.
- Adjust the background, including the brightness, effects or vibrancy to bring your creations to life.

REMOVE UNWANTED DISTRACTIONS
- Brush out blemishes, spots, or small imperfections in seconds using the Spot Healing Brush.
- Quickly and easily remove unwanted content from your images with our powerful Generative Fill feature.

PERSONALIZED IMAGE DESIGN
- Create stunning visual images that are uniquely yours by blending photos, graphics, text, utilizing effects and more.
- Combine unique elements from your own photos with a selection of free Adobe Stock images, including textures, filters, fonts and patterns, to elevate your final creations.
- Effortlessly select an object or person with the Tap Select tool.
- Rearrange objects in your image and control how they come together with layers. 
- Easily add and remove content from your photos using simple text prompts with Generative Fill. Additionally, ideate, create new assets, and jumpstart your creativity using Generate Image.

BRING COLOR AND LIGHT TO LIFE
- Adjust the color of anything, like your shirt, pants or shoes, using adjustment layers. Use the Tap Select and other selection tools to perfectly edit the brightness or vibrancy to add a pop of color to your images.

PREMIUM
- Upgrade to the Photoshop Mobile & Web plan for enhanced control and precision, with access to iPhone, iPad, and web.
- Easily remove entire objects just by brushing over it, and have the background filled in automatically with the Remove Tool.
- Seamlessly fill selected portions of an image with content sampled from other parts of the image with Content Aware Fill.
- Quickly and precisely select people and objects like plants, cars, and more with enhanced precision using Object Select.
- 100 generative credits to add, expand, design or remove content from your images. In addition, ideate, create new assets, and generate your creativity using the latest features like Generate Image. 
- Change unique layer interactions to control transparency, color effects, filters and add style to your images with Advanced Blend Modes.
- Quickly and easily select an object or area of your image based on similar colors and tones with the Magic Wand Tool and retouch it further with targeted adjustments.
- Export in additional file formats (PSD, TIFF, JPG, PNG) and export options for print quality and compression.

apps.subtitle: Subscription Unlocked
apps.localizedDescription:
Y√™u c·∫ßu: IOS 13.0 tr·ªü l√™n 
AdGuard is an ultra-efficient ad blocker for Safari. It will not only remove annoying ads but also secure your privacy with advanced tracking protection. AdGuard for iOS is an open source app, it‚Äôs totally transparent and safe to use. The app is free but offers additional paid Premium features for advanced users.

KEY FEATURES:

- Safari ad blocking. Removes all kinds of ads in Safari. Say goodbye to annoying banners, pop-ups and video ads. Whitelist your favorite websites or use manual blocking tool to hide any element on the page.

- Privacy protection. The web is full of trackers that literally watch your every click. AdGuard offers a selection of filters aimed directly at trackers and web analytics that will ensure your private data stays that way.

- Speed acceleration. Safari browser runs up to 4x faster. AdGuard removes tons of rubbish and you can freely surf the web!

- Reduced traffic consumption and increased battery life. Banners and ads sometimes add up to half the size of the page. By blocking them, you‚Äôre saving your battery life and Wi-Fi/mobile traffic.

- More than 50 popular subscriptions (EasyList, EasyPrivacy, etc.) plus AdGuard's own powerful ad filters, including language-specific filters. Together they don't leave ads a chance.

ADGUARD PREMIUM

AdGuard Premium includes the following features:

- Custom filters. Add your own filters by URL even if they are not on the default list.

- DNS privacy. Blocking regular online trackers is not enough if you want to assure 100% protection of your online privacy. Choose any of the user-favorite DNS providers or configure a custom DNS server.

- Security filters. Protect yourself from dangerous websites riddled with cryptojacking or fraud.

AdGuard Premium is a paid service with the subscription cost $0.99/month or $4.99/year or a one-time purchase of lifetime subscription $12.99 (prices may vary by region). Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Your subscriptions may be managed and your auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchasing a subscription.

* Privacy policy: https://adguard.com/privacy.html
* Terms of Use: https://adguard.com/eula.html

ABOUT ADGUARD

AdGuard is a leading company in developing ad blocking software for multiple platforms. For more than ten years AdGuard has been helping millions of users enjoy safe, clean, and fast internet.

Follow us at @AdGuard on Twitter, facebook.com/AdGuardEn/ on FB or send us a message at support@adguard.com.
